summary: Why do all the shadyside kids just wonder around where ever they please? Like do their parents know what they do all day. “Bye...
question: Why do all the shadyside kids just wonder around where ever they please? Like do their parents know what they do all day. “Bye mom my friends and I are gonna give away free clothes from the dumpster see you tomorrow”
answer: To be fair, that’s exactly what my friends and I did when we were in 8th grade. Not steal dumpster clothes. But run around our town and do whatever we wanted without really telling our parents or anything. And like the kids on the show, 90% of the time we were doing normal kid things but every once in awhile we would stir up some kind of trouble lmao.

reblog.comment: To be fair, that’s exactly what my friends and I did when we were in 8th grade. Not steal dumpster clothes. But run around our town and do whatever we wanted without really telling our parents or anything. And like the kids on the show, 90% of the time we were doing normal kid things but every once in awhile we would stir up some kind of trouble lmao.

But run around our town and do whatever we wanted without really telling our parents or anything. And like the kids on the show, 90% of the time we were doing normal kid things but every once in awhile we would stir up some kind of trouble lmao.
trail.content: To be fair, that’s exactly what my friends and I did when we were in 8th grade. Not steal dumpster clothes. And like the kids on the show, 90% of the time we were doing normal kid things but every once in awhile we would stir up some kind of trouble lmao.

blog.name: ronans-latin-speaking-trees
blog.title: WE SAVED ODAAT.
blog.description:
my heart belongs to a raven king, a dreamer, a magician,

a mirror, a ghost, a beekeeper, & their collective search for a dead Welsh dude.

body:
On 3.16:

-whoo, ok, so can we talk about the fact that we got this ep with NO HIATUS? I feel #blessed

-I knew Bowie still wanted to get married, and I’m glad that they addressed this instead of just showing a perfect cookie-cutter romance💍

-also can we talk abt he fact that Bowie is willing to put aside his own wants and needs to make sure Bex stays comfortable in their relationship, with no pressure? I love them ❤️

-Jamber? An absolute MESS but Endearing Amber is lovely, and Awkward Jonah is HILARIOUS🤣

-I mean, Boy, pretending not to hear her say “I love you”? Honestly, same. ✌️

-Andi gives GREAT ADVICE and honestly I love her relationship w her girlfriend “gal pal” Amber

-Buffy and Cyrus? Supportive Friends™️ and everyone should have a friend group like the GHC tbh 🧑🏻👩🏾‍🦱👦🏻

-I SAW THE STEREOTYPES COMING AS SOON AS CHRISTINA OPENED HER MOUTH

-good for you Andi Mack covering racism towards Asian Americans 👏👏👏

-the scene in the shed had me beaming & crying and all emotional🥺

-I loved how Andi got so excited about the trash #queen 👑

-HAHAHA JONAH AND ANDI SCENE HAD ME CACKLING

-I was kind of wondering if Andi was trying to get her man back with the whole “split a milkshake” thing idk 😬

-ANDI’S ART PIECE!!!!! truly incredible. She blew it out of the park.

-overall? A FANTASTIC episode. It felt kind of like 8.02 of Game of Thrones, just a really enjoyable and satisfying ep all around.

AND NOW, onto my thoughts on future eps:

3.17????

MUFFY MUFFY MUFFY!

I’m ready to collect

my endgame. #BYERACHEL #RACHELWHO?

-we know that Marty and Rachel will break up next ep and THIS is the kind of jealous /angst content that I am HERE FOR.

-P.S. Cyrus in the promo? Most supportive friend. Best platonic pairing on the show is easily Buffy and Cyrus.

-also I know we have no Tyrus rn, from what I like to refer to as 3:16 — The Ambi Centric Episode, and 3:17 — The Muffy Centric Episode…

-but Tyrus is one endgame that I am SO ready to collect, remember we have 2 TJ eps and 1 Kira ep left, and I am READY for my boys to confess their love on that bench.

-oh and art school? Good way to end the series, I approve.

✌️➕❤️

blog.name: bmgmw
blog.title: it's all about perspective
blog.description: 27. F. Bi. Hodgepodge of AM, GoT, ODAAT, AWAE, GMW, B99, TGP and whatever else I end up getting sucked into 📺ask box open :)

summary: I have a terrible gut feeling they’re going to make Bex feel bad/guilty that Bowie’s upset, and they’re going to make her...
body: I have a terrible gut feeling they’re going to make Bex feel bad/guilty that Bowie’s upset, and they’re going to make her suddenly decide she *does* want to get married and that that desire is genuine (vs guilt based). It would be such a disservice to Bex’s character. And I really didn’t think they could make the idea of Bexie marriage get even uglier yet……

reblog.comment: I have a terrible gut feeling they’re going to make Bex feel bad/guilty that Bowie’s upset, and they’re going to make her suddenly decide she *does* want to get married and that that desire is genuine (vs guilt based). It would be such a disservice to Bex’s character. And I really didn’t think they could make the idea of Bexie marriage get even uglier yet……

It would be such a disservice to Bex’s character. And I really didn’t think they could make the idea of Bexie marriage get even uglier yet……

It would be such a disservice to Bex’s character. And I really didn’t think they could make the idea of Bexie marriage get even uglier yet……
